about_the_game:
Pick up a Gold Starter Pack to rise, shine and dominate in EVE Online. Start out with key items and access to the full EVE experience. Explore the possibilities, train, specialize, customize your character, and more.

Includes:

  • 60 days Omega time - Get the complete EVE experience, including access to all the biggest and best ships, and 10 x the EverMarks for completing Paragon missions.
  • 500 PLEX - Premium in-game currency to spend or trade.
  • 500,000 Skill Points - Invest and specialize your pilot.
  • Standard 'Boost' Cerebral Accelerator - Train even faster for 4 days (or 8 days with the Biology 5 skill).
  • Eight incredible ship SKINs - Dominate New Eden and look great doing it!
  • Pilot apparel - Dress to impress or intimidate.

Single purchase per account.
detailed_description:
Steam Created Accounts Only

This content can only be accessed with EVE Online accounts created through Steam. Existing EVE Online accounts not created through Steam cannot benefit from it.


About the Game

Pick up a Gold Starter Pack to rise, shine and dominate in EVE Online. Start out with key items and access to the full EVE experience. Explore the possibilities, train, specialize, customize your character, and more.

Includes:

  • 60 days Omega time - Get the complete EVE experience, including access to all the biggest and best ships, and 10 x the EverMarks for completing Paragon missions.
  • 500 PLEX - Premium in-game currency to spend or trade.
  • 500,000 Skill Points - Invest and specialize your pilot.
  • Standard 'Boost' Cerebral Accelerator - Train even faster for 4 days (or 8 days with the Biology 5 skill).
  • Eight incredible ship SKINs - Dominate New Eden and look great doing it!
  • Pilot apparel - Dress to impress or intimidate.

Single purchase per account.
name: EVE Online: Gold Starter pack

package_groups.title: Buy EVE Online: Gold Starter pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB Free Space
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection (or faster)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB free space
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection or faster

short_description: For even more goodies, get the Gold pack which contains 60 days Omega, 500 PLEX, 500,000 SP, eight SKINs, a Standard ‘Boost’ Cerebral Accelerator, and pilot apparel.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian*, French*, Korean*, Japanese*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
